text: @DrRobDavidson @realDonaldTrump @GovWhitmer PRESIDENT TRUMP MICHIGAN NEEDS YOUR EMERGENCY HELP AND THAT OF THE AG'S OFFICE, THE MORONIC MICHIGAN STATE GOVERNOR HAS THREATENED TO JAIL DOCTORS AND PHARMACISTS IF THEY PRESCRIBE CHLORIQUIN FOR COVI-19 PLEASE WE NEED EMERGENCY HELP https://t.co/L8XR4OygUJ

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
